Package io.curiositycore.thecuriositycore.database.mysql.table

Class BaseSqlTable

java.lang.Object
io.curiositycore.thecuriositycore.database.mysql.table.BaseSqlTable
All Implemented Interfaces:
Table
public abstract class BaseSqlTable extends Object implements Table
Abstract class representing the generalisation of a table stored within a database. This class acts as a localised cache of the table.


NOTE: Do not utilise this class for large data sets, as it would cause significant RAM utilisation.

  • Method Details

    • initTable

      protected void initTable()
      Initialises the table. Creation is determined by if the table already exists. If existing, its values are queried and used for construction. If it does not, a new table with the user-defined columns are constructed.

    • addColumnToCache

      Parameters:
      sqlColumnToAdd - The column to add to the cached table.

    • areCorrectDataTypes

      protected boolean areCorrectDataTypes(Object[] valuesToCheck, SqlDataTypes[] columnTypes)
      Checks to see if each object within the row is of the correct data type. This helps ensure type safety and reduces the risk of SQL injection.
      Parameters:
      valuesToCheck - The object array of values to add to the table.
      columnTypes - The data types of each column within the table.
      Returns:
      True if the value's data types match that of the columns, false if they do not.

    • getCastedValue

      protected <T> T getCastedValue(Class<T> clazz, Object object)
      Gets the cast value of the Sql row. This functionality is cruical to ensure correct retreival of data from database rows.
      Type Parameters:
      T - The generic of the class of the object to retrieve.
      Parameters:
      clazz - The class of the value to retrieve.
      object - The object to be cast.
      Returns:
      The cast value of the retrieved row data.

      Gets the row within the sqlRow field, based on the row's index.
      Parameters:
      rowIndex - The index of the row to retrieve.
      Returns:
      The SqlRow to retrieve.
